TopicTitle: 2 Videos: Spaceplane to Duna and back, small Solarplane on Duna

Articles.Content:
Hi,

first video shows a spaceplaneflight to Duna, land and come back to KSC without refueling.

the second shows a funny small solarplane on Duna. ItÃ‚Â´s the whole mission, with transfer to Duna and back (without the solarplane).

Enjoy it

Nice,

I really like your design, as I am trying to make a space plane to Duna. It is meant to be permanent plane for duna, but is was wondering, since you've been there, do the jet engines/rapier engines work? Or does only rocket engines work.

Nice work BTW!!

Nice!

Plane handles well, lifts off without jumping off the runway's end, chose the lowest ground for landing...

Perfect! ;]

Skylid Jets (and rapier jet mode) work only on Kerbin & Laythe,

Duna/Eve/Jool don't work because they don't have oxygen atmosphere.

Thanks ,

Overfloater have said it before. On duna i have only used the atomic engines.

There are four 24/77 engines in the bottom of the plane to land softer and for supporting the lift off. But for the final version in the video, i have optimized the wings, so it was not necessary to use them (save fuel for the flight back).

To land on Laythe is like a birthday party compared with Duna

agreed, I read your posts, far after putting a rapier jet onto LDO. Although it is quite manuverable in Duna atmosphere, it wont slow down past 150m/s without stalling, and I am quite sure youy guys know what happens when you try to land in a valley going 150m/s

Thanks for your help, I actually thought that the engines would work on eve. Now i no not to fly a jet there!

If you want to land on Duna, be sure you have enough lift. Simple rule: The spaceplane flies well on Kerbin, put more wings on it to handle it well on Duna.

Eve...arrgh. I tried once...
